question: Who of the following is appointed as the brand ambassador of Signature Global?
explanation: Realty firm Signature Global, which is into development of affordable homes, has roped in Bollywood actress Vidya Balan as brand ambassador. It has launched 9 affordable housing projects, comprising about 9,300 units in a price range of Rs 15-25 lakh, in Gurgaon in the last three years of operations. All projects are under the Haryana Affordable Housing scheme. Signature Global plans to expand business beyond Gurgaon and targets to launch 20,000 more affordable housing units by 2019.
